channel.title: Blog on Lekshmi Kolappan
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Lekshmi Kolappan

item.title: Boto3 Resource, Client and Session
item.description: Core concepts of Boto3 There are few concepts of boto3 (aws sdk) like Session, Resource, Client, Meta, Collections, Paginators In this post we will discuss about the kehy difference between Resource, Client and Session Session A session manages state about a particular configuration. By default, a session is created for you when needed. However, it’s possible and recommended that in some scenarios you maintain your own session.

item.title: Making a new Website
item.description: For a long time this website has had a couple of links to contact me, but those days are over. Now I have a brand new Hugo website with a custom written theme complete with A homepage with more social links, and description of my skills An about page with description of who I am A portfolio page to showcase all my projects A blog Why Hugo? The first question is why a site builder?
